pkgmetadata.longdescription: # rcplus-alloy-lib-py-common![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/rcplus-alloy-common)![PyPI - Python Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/rcplus-alloy-common)![Coverage badge](./coverage.svg)Current version: **v1.2.0**---Python utilities for RC+/Alloy._**NOTE**_: This Python package is published to PyPI.org as publicly available package.## Install```bashpip install -U rcplus-alloy-common```## Usage### Structured loggingTODO### Application metricsTODO### Airflow```bashpip install -U rcplus-alloy-common[airflow]```TODO
